subject: Re: [PATCH v2 1/2] mm: zswap: add per-memcg stat for incompressible pages

reviews.author: Jiayuan Chen (author)
reviews.summary: The reviewer approved the patch and provided no specific technical concerns or comments.

reviews.author: Yosry Ahmed
reviews.summary: Reviewer Yosry Ahmed found the patch mostly acceptable but thought the comment was not very useful, suggesting it might not be worth sending a new version.

reviews.author: Nhat Pham
reviews.summary: Reviewer Nhat Pham raised a question about using MADV_PAGEOUT instead of memory.reclaim, but ultimately approved the patch.

reviews.author: SeongJae Park
reviews.summary: Reviewer SeongJae Park found the patch useful and suggested minor formatting improvements, but did not raise any technical concerns.

reviews.author: JP Kobryn
reviews.summary: Reviewer JP Kobryn suggested using synchronization (eventfd) to prevent a potential race condition in the zswap patch.

reviews.author: Chengming Zhou
reviews.summary: Reviewer Chengming Zhou approved the patch and gave a Reviewed-by tag, but no specific technical comments were made.
